actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to require the enactment of special legislation to continue the expenditure or obligation of funds on any major military or civil acquisition whenever the cost of such acquisition has increased or, on the basis of estimates, will increase by 50 per centum or more.

summary.text: Requires the enactment of special legislation to continue the expenditure or obligation of funds on any major military or civil acquisition whenever the cost of such acquisition has increased or, on the basis of estimates, will increase by 50 percent or more.

titles.title: A bill to require the enactment of special legislation to continue the expenditure or obligation of funds on any major military or civil acquisition whenever the cost of such acquisition has increased or, on the basis of estimates, will increase by 50 per centum or more.
